attributes.action: write-off the £80m debt burden currently being suffered by the Mid Yorkshire Hospitals NHS Trust'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, the Trust that manages the hospitals serving Dewsbury, Wakefield and Pontefract is being crushed by a huge debt of around £80m. Although the Trust is now under new-management, its effectiveness, and the morale of it staff, is being seriously hampered by this crushing deficit.

We call upon this government to write-off this huge burden to safeguard NHS jobs and patient care for all the people of Dewsbury, Wakefield and Pontefract.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
